trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Poway
There were no other sightings in Poway on or around August 22nd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my south facing windows in south poway at about 945 PM last night, all of a sudden, with no sound, a bright emerald coloured meteorite like object came streaking out of the sky at a 45 degree angle, it was like a very bright meteorite except it was bright emerald, itr left no gas trails even though i have seen large meteorites (though still smaller than this one) before and they have, and although it got brighter as it streaked down towards the earth, it did get brighter and continued to become more luminescent, it went behind a small ridge to the south, and i could still see a green glow for a few seconds, on the other side of the ridge is Marine Corps Air Station Miramar.
Summary: Bright emerald colour, looked like a giant green meteorite
